summary: Website "Paperly" for teachers (and students) to generate question papers, with unlimited question/paper generation, the ability to merge multiple papers into one, and a student experience for solving AI-generated papers and asking doubts.

existing_features.title: Create the Paperly app shell and navigation with core pages for question paper creation and management: (1) Generate Paper page, (2) My Papers list page, (3) Paper detail/edit page, and (4) Merge Papers page.

Add a question paper generator workflow that lets a teacher define paper parameters (e.g., title, subject, grade/class, number of questions, difficulty mix, marks per question) and generates a draft paper that can be edited before saving.

Implement paper merging: allow selecting two or more existing papers and merging them into a new paper, preserving question order and clearly handling title/metadata conflicts (e.g., choose a new title and select subject/grade or set them manually).
Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for Paperly and use it consistently across all pages (typography, spacing, button styles, cards, and form layout). Avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Add generated static image assets for branding and ensure they are used in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).

Extend user onboarding to require selecting an account role (Teacher or Student) and persist the role in the user profile. Update the Profile Setup modal to include a role selector and show a prominent warning for students about not using a Teacher account with the exact warning text: "Warning for students: Do not use a Teacher account. If you use a Teacher account, you will be banned permanently."

Implement role-based navigation and route access: Teacher-only access to existing teacher workflows (Generate, My Papers, Paper Detail, Merge Papers) and add a Student Portal route for Student users. Update the header navigation to show Teacher links only for Teacher role, and show a "Student Portal" link only for Student role. When a user attempts to access a route not permitted for their role, show an in-app access denied message explaining they must switch to the correct role/account.

Create a Student Portal page that allows students to generate an AI-style practice question paper (using the existing local generator) and solve it interactively. The solving experience must let a student: start a session, answer each multiple-choice question, navigate between questions, submit, and see a results summary (score, correct/incorrect per question, and the correct answer).

Add an "AI Doubt Solver" feature within the Student Portal that lets a student ask a doubt while solving and receive a helpful explanation derived from the current question data (e.g., restating the question, highlighting the correct option, and providing a structured explanation). This must work without any external AI/LLM service integrations.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Paperly website for teachers to generate question papers
Support unlimited question generation and question paper generation
Add question paper merging feature (merge two or more papers into one)
Implement backend data models and persistence for question papers, including create/read/update/list operations so generated papers can be saved and revisited.
Add role selection (Teacher vs Student) and enforce account-use policy with a student warning that using a teacher account leads to permanent ban
Create Student page/portal to solve question papers generated by AI (interactive solving experience)
Add AI doubt solver feature for students to ask questions and get explanations while solving/learning
